item.title: Africa (non-med)
item.description: ghAnA - agbala or juju or black magic or vodu practitioners. AZ15. History Mauryan-shAtavAhana hindu cultural influence on Meroetic kingdom [TW1, SPR].

item.title: Korea
item.description: History Korean elite for long accepted and appreciated an inferior vassal status relative to the Chinese empire in all respects. For notes on later barbarian invasions and Japanese takeover, see the japan pages. Christian epidemic Misin Tapa Udong Late Joseon (1890s) - Protestantism sunk deep roots in Korea in the 1890s, establishing a network of schools and hospitals. The missionaries led campaigns for the burning of idols, ancestral tablets, shamans’ tools and clothes, and shrines.
